title: ELEX (RUS/ENG/GER)[RePack] by XaTaB
description:
Year: October 17, 2017 
Genre: RPG 
Developer: Piranha Bytes 
Publisher: Nordic Games Publishing 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language: Russian / English MULTi8 
Language: English / German 
Tabletka: Not required (GOG) 

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 (64-bit versions) 
Processor: Intel Core i5 at 2.5 GHz or better or AMD Phenom II x4 940 at 3.0 GHz; 
RAM: 6 GB 
Video card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570 or AMD Radeon HD 5870, 1 GB VRAM or better; 
Free space on your hard disk: 26.5 GB

DESCRIPTION: 
ELEX is a carefully crafted dynamic role-playing game created by award-winning authors of the Gothic series. 
Its action unfolds in a new post-apocalyptic science-fiction universe: players are waiting 
for a huge seamless world full of vivid characters, grotesque mutants, moral dilemmas and intense adventures. 
In ELEX, you enter the war for a valuable resource that gives superhuman opportunities, but turns people into cold, 
insensitive beings. You decide what will prevail in the Magalan world: emotions and humanity or cold synthetic logic. 

FEATURES: 
- Based on the release from GOG 
- Polish localization is cut / Nothing is recoded 
- Game archives are not opened 
- Game version 1.0
- Change voice language when installing the game in the installer 
- Installation time 5 minutes on the HDD (Depends on the computer) 
Repack from xatab

Isntall notes:
1. Burn or mount the image
2. Install the game
4. Play the game
